snippet: A raid that appeared to be aimed at arresting people suspected as Palestinian militants turned into an armed confrontation in the Jenin refugee camp.
abstract: Israeli Army raid of Jenin refugee camp in West Bank turns into hours-long armed confrontation with Palestinian gunmen, most serious clash in area in 18 months; raid appears to have been made to arrest suspected Palestinian militants.

byline.original: By DIAA HADID and RAMI NAZZAL
byline.contributor: Gabby Sobelman contributed reporting from Rehovot, Israel.

lead_paragraph: A raid that appeared to be aimed at arresting people suspected as Palestinian militants turned into an armed confrontation in the Jenin refugee camp.

headline.main: Clash Erupts During Raid by Israelis in West Bank
headline.print_headline: Clash Erupts During Raid by Israelis in West Bank
